name: Counter Clockwise
description:
Welcome to this first little project of mine.

Gameplay :

Counter Clockwise is a sort of puzzle game in which you control a little square in its way out of a labyrinth. The only issue is that our little square moves forward and can only turn left. Your goal is to gather correct timing and pathing to get it out of here !

Context :

Counter Clockwise is not really a game I wanted to create. I am currently learning game development on www.gamecodeur.fr and after the first four lessons, I wanted to take a break in the courses, to practice some of what I just learned. This is how I started by moving a simple square and improved it until the current results.

As it especially was a development practice, I apologize for the poor level design and the lack of levels.

I am looking forward to getting your feedbacks ! Thank you for reading and for playing :)
